column4: What kernel should I choose on an AMD AthlonXP 2700+ with 1 GB ram ?? and will it support the 1 GB I have ?

ext3
Why Ext3 and not ReiserFS, Reiser4, XFS or JFS ?
ext3 is more stable and has better tools to work with it
But distro"s like Suse use ReiserFS as default... So I get confused :-(
suse has issues

I ask because I had to Install Hoary 3 times on my laptop because EXT3 keep's crashing, and ResierFS has no problems. and now I want to install Breezy on my desktop, and I'm searching all over the net about FileSystems...to decide..
go with what you are comforable with, i've never had a problem with ext3
